text: David Levering Lewis (born May 25, 1936) is an American historian. He is a professor of history at New York University. He won the Pulitzer Prize two times for part one and part two of his biography of W. E. B. Du Bois in 1994 and 2001. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:American historians Category:New York University faculty Category:Writers from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Writers from New York City
title: David Levering Lewis
